results.name: wordpress/wordpress-ingress

error.Text: Ingress wordpress/wordpress-ingress does not specify an Ingress class.
Ingress uses the secret wordpress/wordpress-tls-secret as a TLS certificate which does not exist.

results.details:
Error: The Ingress for wordpress/wordpress-ingress lacks an Ingress class and references a non-existent TLS secret wordpress/wordpress-tls-secret.

Solution: 1. Add an Ingress class annotation to the Ingress. 2. Create the TLS secret wordpress/wordpress-tls-secret in the same namespace.
